name: Groodge
description:
You have to guess the pictures as fast as possible. Prove to your friends you have a faster eye than them.

WHATS SPECIAL?
Increase your chances of winning? Yes! By changing the puzzle pictures with graphic effects. Your opponent will never guess them as quickly as you.

LETS GO:
# Guessing thousands of pictures
# Players from all over the world
# Upload your own profile picture
# 4 different rankings
# Find friends on Facebook and Twitter
# Chat with your opponent
# Jokers, for fast help
